content: Hello friends, do you know if there are any FHIR data test servers out there with oData service and feed? I am trying to connect to test patient data through Analytical tools. Do you know if the EHR vendors are enabling their SMART on FHIR servers with oData Services?
You should check out the analytics on fhir stream https://chat.fhir.org/#narrow/stream/73-analytics-on.20FHIR
